answers.answer: I'm 8 weeks and until about two weeks ago I had horrible horrible cramps with throwing up whenever my body felt like having them. They have stopped my doctor said its normal. As long as your not bleeding or spotting
That's what I keep hearing that its normal as long as there's no spotting or bleeding, but I just wanted to double check because it has me scared.
Call your dr and ask. I had a missed miscarriage & had quite a bit of cramping but I never once bled
I also have diabetes when my sugar would get too high I would get sick. Just make sure with your doc is your best bet

question: I'm 5 weeks & 3 days pregnant, I have been having cramps on and off some more moderate than others and nownI'm starting to have back pain, is this normal?? Approximately a year ago I suffered from a miscarriage so every little thing paranoids me.
title: help??
